Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Transfusion.display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate
Transfusion.display_target_help: Your Regeneration rate has been reduced.

Fulcrum_Shift.display_help: Fulcrum Shift drains the power of a targeted foe and all foes nearby, transferring it to all adjacent allies, the caster, and those near the caster. Affected foes will deal less damage, while your affected allies will deal more. The more foes that are affected, the more power your allies receive. Fulcrum Shift can dramatically turn the tide of a melee battle. Recharge: Long
Fulcrum_Shift.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.

Regeneration_Aura.display_help: The Regeneration Aura dramatically increases the healing rate of all nearby heroes for a limited time. Emitting this Aura costs you a lot of Endurance, and it takes a long time to recharge. Recharge: Very Long
Regeneration_Aura.display_target_help: The Regeneration Aura is improving your Healing Rate, allowing you to battle longer!
Regeneration_Aura.display_attacker_hit: You increase the Hit Point Regeneration of {PlayerDest}.

Transponder.display_help: The Rikti Commander can create an inter-dimensional Transponder. Other Rikti soldiers can teleport in through this Transponder to join their allies. The Transponder can be destroyed.
Transponder.display_target_help: The Rikti Commander can create an inter-dimensional Transponder. Other Rikti soldiers can teleport in through this Transponder to join their allies. The Transponder can be destroyed.

Teleport_Friend.display_help: You can Teleport one of your teammates to yourself. The target must be a teammate and can be selected from the Team Window. You can also rescue a fallen teammate who may be in a hostile location, as long as he is on the same map. This power can be interrupted.
Teleport_Friend.display_target_help: You can Teleport one of your teammates to yourself. The target must be a teammate and can be selected from the Team Window. You can also rescue a fallen teammate who may be in a hostile location, as long as he is on the same map. This power can be interrupted.

Teleport_Foe.display_help: You can Teleport a single foe directly next to yourself. A successful hit must be made in order to Teleport the target, and some powerful foes cannot be Teleported. This power can be interrupted.
Teleport_Foe.display_target_help: You can Teleport a single foe directly next to yourself. A successful hit must be made in order to Teleport the target, and some powerful foes cannot be Teleported. This power can be interrupted.

Teleport.display_help: You can Teleport long distances. Teleport has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.
Teleport.display_target_help: You can Teleport long distances. Teleport has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.

Resistance.display_help: Rikti Commanders are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Teleport, and Smashing, Lethal and Energy damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Teleport, Smashing, Lethal, Energy
Resistance.display_target_help: Rikti Commanders are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Teleport, and Smashing, Lethal and Energy damage.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Teleport, Smashing, Lethal, Energy

Radiation_Emission.display_help: The Radiation Emission power utilizes the healing properties of radiation to re-energize your allies. This power radiates out from the Rikti and restores some health to all nearby allies.
Radiation_Emission.display_target_help: The Radiation Emission power utilizes the healing properties of radiation to re-energize your allies. This power radiates out from the Rikti and restores some health to all nearby allies.

Accelerate_Metabolism.display_help: Activating this power emits radiation that increases the running speed, attack speed, Endurance Recovery and Damage potential of all nearby allies. Affected Rikti Metabolism is increased so much that they become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient and Immobilization. The Rikti are not protected from such effects, they just ware off faster.
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_target_help: Activating this power emits radiation that increases the running speed, attack speed, Endurance Recovery and Damage potential of all nearby allies. Affected Rikti Metabolism is increased so much that they become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient and Immobilization. The Rikti are not protected from such effects, they just ware off faster.

Protection_Shield.display_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
Protection_Shield.display_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
Protection_Shield.display_target_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
Protection_Shield.display_target_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
Protection_Shield.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

Resistance.display_help: The Drones maneuverability make it very hard to hit, and they have good defense to melee and ranged attacks, but they are relatively fragile otherwise. Since they are machines, they are immune to Sleep and Fear powers and are resistant to psionic damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Self Auto, +DEF(Melee, Ranged, Psionic), Res Sleep, Fear
Resistance.display_target_help: The Drones maneuverability make it very hard to hit, and they have good defense to melee and ranged attacks, but they are relatively fragile otherwise. Since they are machines, they are immune to Sleep and Fear powers and are resistant to psionic damage.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Self Auto, +DEF(Melee, Ranged, Psionic), Res Sleep, Fear

Drone_Blast.display_help: The Rikti Drones Blasts deal a lot of damage and can Knockdown foes.
Drone_Blast.display_target_help: The Rikti Drones Blasts deal a lot of damage and can Knockdown foes.

Gas.display_help: When Rikti Monkeys die, their bodies emits a noxious gas that can harm enemies and friends alike.
Gas.display_target_help: When Rikti Monkeys die, their bodies emits a noxious gas that can harm enemies and friends alike.

Monkey_Jumping.display_help: Rikti Monkeys can inherently jump real high and travel very fast.
Monkey_Jumping.display_target_help: Rikti Monkeys can inherently jump real high and travel very fast.

Transponder.display_help: The Rikti Communications Officer can create an inter-dimensional Transponder. Other Rikti soldiers can teleport in through this Transponder to join their allies. The Transponder can be destroyed.
Transponder.display_target_help: The Rikti Communications Officer can create an inter-dimensional Transponder. Other Rikti soldiers can teleport in through this Transponder to join their allies. The Transponder can be destroyed.

Paralytic_Blast.display_help: You have been terrorized. Your are taking Damage over Time from an overload to your synapses. Your movement rate and attack speeds are reduced as well.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Terrorize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Terrorizes you with their {PowerName}.

Scorch.display_help: The Hero's hands are engulfed in flames, igniting the target.

Cremate.display_help: A slow but devastating attack. Cremate clobbers your foes with a massive 2 handed fiery smash that leaves your foe set on fire. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Consume.display_help: You can drain body heat from all nearby foes in order to replenish your own Endurance. The more foes affected, the more Endurance is gained. Foes suffer minimal Fire damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

Incinerate.display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Fire_Shield.display_help: While this power is active, you get a good resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. Recharge: Very Fast

Plasma_Shield.display_help: While this power is active, you get a good resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Fire Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage. Plasma Shield also gives your protection from Sleep and Hold effects.
Plasma_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative, Hold, Sleep))

Fire_Breath.display_help: The Hero breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.

Healing_Flames.display_help: You can concentrate for a few moments and to dramatically heal himself with Healing Flames. The power of the flames can also protect you from Disorientation for a while.

Fiery_Embrace.display_help: Significantly boosts the damage of all your Fire attacks for quite a while. Also increases the damage of all your other non-fire based attacks for a short while. Recharge: Very Long

Envenom.display_help: Your Defense, Damage Resistances and Regeneration have been reduced. You also Heal less from Heal powers.
Envenom.display_attacker_hit: You Envenom {PlayerDest} and reduced his Defense and Damage Resistance and Regeneration.
Envenom.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Defense, Damage Resistance and Regeneration.

Weaken.display_help: Your Accuracy and Damage potential and power effects have all been reduced.
Weaken.display_attacker_hit: You Weaken {PlayerDest} and reduced his Accuracy, Damage and power effects.
Weaken.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Accuracy Damage and power effects.

Transformation.display_help: These Rikti have shapeshifted into Arachnos Bane Spiders.

Nuke.display_help: This unleashes a devastating EMP strike over a wide area of effect, draining Endurance from foes. Robotic units are especially vulnerable to this effect. You may only use this ability once.
Nuke.display_target_help: The Nuclear Blast has reduced your Endurance Recovery.

Assault.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage and are resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Assault.display_target_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are partially resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
Assault.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Tactics.display_help: While this power is active, your Accuracy and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. You must be at least level 14 and have Defense or Assault before selecting Tactics.
Tactics.display_target_help: Your Accuracy and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.
Tactics.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception.
Tactics.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception with good {PowerName}.

Swarm_Missile.display_help: The Pylon can launch a pack of 8 Swarm missiles.
